mapper.select: SELECT i.*, (SELECT u.name FROM unit u WHERE u.cod = i.unit_cod) AS 'unitName', (SELECT u.name FROM unit u WHERE u.cod = i.mgmt_unit_cod) AS 'mgmtUnitName', (SELECT p.name FROM productgroup p WHERE p.cod = i.productgroup_cod) As 'prodgroupName' FROM inventory i
mapper.update: UPDATE inventory SET cur_inv_qty = cur_inv_qty + #{amount} WHERE cod = #{cod};
